climbs.name: Koalas in Space
climbs.fa: Michal Matyjasik and Erin DeMarco March 2020

content.description:
This fun and airy route climbs the center of the Koala Pillar. Mostly moderate but exciting moves on fantastic quality chert take one through several slight bulges, leading to heroic moves on giant sculpted chert knobs pulling the last bulge.

 This route was equipped ground up on lead from stances and hooks. However, the climbing is well protected. All hardware is stainless and the anchors are equipped with bomber Climb Tech lower off hooks.
content.protection: 10 SS bolts to lower off anchors
content.location: Follow the fixed line Tyrolean to its end. Belay here and climb straight up.

content.description: This area is just left of the Hourglass and around the corner to the right of the Sunny Side. Look for the obvious pillar leaning against the formation that goes to half height.
